name: Misual
description:
Misual is a 3D game in which you control physics!

You can:

  • Spawn objects by left-clicking.
  • Edit different properties, such as gravity, mass, drag, angular drag and more, by pressing E.
  • Play with your friends, or alone!
  • + many more!

Additional information can be found in the info tab on the main menu.
This game is currently in beta, feel free to comment ideas and report bugs!

HAVE FUN!
